div.head: Essential Reading
div.p: The work here is based on the following references, which I highly recommend anyone who wishes to use or comment on these guidelines have a look at first:

M. Dohnicht. "Zusammenstellung der diakritischen Zeichen zur Wiedergabe der lateinischen Inschrifttexte der Antike f√ºr den Unicode (Entwurft Juli 2000)." http://www.csad.ox.ac.uk/varia/unicode/Dohnicht.pdf (hereafter cited as DONICHT).
S. Dow. Conventions in editing: a suggested reformulation of the Leiden System. Greek, Roman and Byzantine Studies Scholarly Aids 2. Durham 1969 (hereafter cited as DOW).
T. Finney. "Converting Leiden-style Editions to TEI Lite XML" (2001): http://www.tei-c.org/Sample_Manuals/Leiden.html (hereafter cited as FINNEY).
S. Panciera. "Struttura dei supplementi e segni diacritici dieci anni dopo" in SupIt 8 (1991), 9-21 (hereafter cited as PANCIERA).
